page.description: Removes a user from a role.
page.syntax: Context.Security.RemoveUserFromRole as L (UserName as C, RoleName as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user was removed from the role; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: The name of the user to be removed from the role.

argument.name: RoleName as C
argument.description: The name of the role from which the user should be removed.

page.discussion: Context.Security.RemoveUserFromRole() removes a user from a role. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
